mapper.select: select b.BRAND_ID ,b.BRAND_NAME ,b.BRAND_MANAGER ,b.BRAND_MANAGER_TEL ,b.STORES_NUMBER ,b.PROVINCE_CODE ,b.REGION_CODE ,b.CITY_CODE ,b.INDUSTRY_ID ,b.CATEGORY_ID ,i.INDUSTRY_NAME AS industryName ,c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName ,b.CONTACT_NAME ,b.CONTACT_TEL ,b.MERCHANT_NAME ,b.MERCHANT_TEL ,b.SIGN_CONTRACT_DATE ,b.CREATE_DATE from dn_brand as b left join dn_industry i on i.INDUSTRY_ID=b.INDUSTRY_ID left join dn_category c on c.CATEGORY_ID=b.CATEGORY_ID where BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=CHAR}
